sentences.en: ‘We made the front page!’ Jos exulted.
sentences.cn: “我们上了头版！”乔斯欣喜若狂道。

sentences.en: Can even sacrificial flesh avert your doom? Can you then exult?
sentences.cn: 难道祭肉可以消除你的灾祸,使你得著欢乐 吗 ?

sentences.en: Exult, O shores and ring, O bells!
sentences.cn: 欢呼吧, 彼岸上的人们!敲响吧, 彼岸上的钟声!

sentences.en: Exult, O shores! Bnd ring , O bells!
sentences.cn: 哦!欢乐的度过吧, 海岸! 齐鸣吧, 钟!

sentences.en: Few people would not exult at the smash of the gang of four.
sentences.cn: 很少有人不为“四人帮”的粉碎而欢呼雀跃.

sentences.en: He would exult over me and despise me.
sentences.cn: 他对我耀武扬威,不屑一顾.

sentences.en: How long shall the wicked, O Lord, How long shall the wicked exult?
sentences.cn: 诗94:3耶和华阿 、 恶人夸胜要到几时呢、要到几时 呢 .

sentences.en: I must not exult too soon.
Let's exult with the children at the drawing near of Children's Day.
sentences.cn: 六一儿童节到了,让我们陪着小朋友们一起欢腾.

sentences.en: My inward parts will also exult , When your lips speak right things.
sentences.cn: 16你的嘴若说正直话,我的心肠也必欢乐.

sentences.en: To dance, clap hands, exult, shout, skip , leap, roll on, float on!
sentences.cn: 舞蹈著, 鼓掌著, 欢腾著, 呼喊著, 蹦跳著, 跃动著, 翻滚著, 一直飘遥!

sentences.en: To rejoice over a success or victory; exult.
sentences.cn: 庆祝胜利或成功; 得意洋洋.

sentences.en: Who rejoice greatly , And exult when they find the grave?
sentences.cn: 伯3:22他们寻见坟墓就快乐 、 极其欢喜.

sentences.en: You need not exult over him, good brother of the southern states.
sentences.cn: 南方各州善心的弟兄们,你们且莫自鸣得意,认为自己比他强.

sentences.en: You need not exult over them, good brothers of the Southern States.
sentences.cn: 南方各洲善心的弟兄们,你们且莫自鸣得意,认为自己比他们强.

words.tran_cn: 非常高兴的；欢跃的；狂喜的；欢欣鼓舞的

trans.tran_en: to show that you are very happy and proud, especially because you have succeeded in doing something
